◆ pksav_import_base256()

enum pksav_error pksav_import_base256 ( const uint8_t *  p_buffer,
size_t  num_bytes,
size_t *  p_result_out 
)

Convert a Base-256 number to Base-10.

Parameters
bufferwhere original Base-256 number is stored
num_bytesnumber of bytes to convert
result_outconverted Base-10 number
Returns
PKSAV_ERROR_NONE upon success
PKSAV_ERROR_NULL_POINTER if buffer or result_out is NULL

Convert a Base-10 number to Base-256.

Parameters
numBase-10 number to convert
buffer_outwhere to store converted Base-256 number
buffer_sizesize of the buffer_out parameter
Returns
PKSAV_ERROR_NONE upon success
PKSAV_ERROR_NULL_POINTER if buffer_out is NULL
